H0.text: As at 2010 who is the MP for Belfast West. Martin McGuinness

H1.text: As at 2010 who is the MP for Belfast West. Alex Maskey

H2.text: As at 2010 who is the MP for Belfast West. Paul Maskey

H3.text: As at 2010 who is the MP for Belfast West. GERRY ADAMS

A4.text: McGuinness served as Member of Parliament (MP) for Mid Ulster from 1997 until his resignation in 2013.

A5.text: The Member of Parliament since a 2011 by-election is Paul Maskey of Sinn Féin, who succeeded Gerry Adams.

A6.text: In 2011, Adams decided to stand in the 2011 Irish general election and vacated his seat.
